participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Reflective and somewhat somber, yet hopeful about the future.
participant_1.background: i will be released in about a month. i'm here for shoplifting. i feel old. i'm currently in a juvenile detention center. my mom is coming to visit me tomorrow.

participant_2.name: Luna
participant_2.personality: Imaginative and whimsical, often feeling isolated yet possessing a sense of wonder.
participant_2.background: i live in the cloud. i'm a little girl. i like to make time stop. i'm very lonely. i have superpowers.
